translation:
If you associate the tool with the pmx or x file extension, you can launch the viewer by double-clicking the file.
You can also apply motions and toggle material display.

Displays the selected material.
Initially, all materials are selected and displayed.
Selecting a material toggles its selection state.
Holding Shift while selecting toggles the selection state of materials within the range.
If a texture cannot be interpreted, the text color will be displayed in red.

id: モデルファイルを選択してください
translation:

Vmd or Vpd files can be opened.
Inverts the selection state of all materials.
